archimate:Principle.name: Sovrin Infrastructure Roles
archimate:Principle.documentation: The business roles defined in the Sovrin Governance Framework for each of the four Sovrin Infrastructure Layers: Sovrin Ledger Layer Roles, Agent-to-Agent Protocol Layer Roles, Credential Exchange Layer Roles, and Governance Framework Layer Roles. See Appendix D.
